label: 衛士府
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Headqurarters of the Guards (Efu) in charge of patrolling the Greater Imperial Palace (Daidairi) grounds. Later amalgamated with the Headquarters of the Gate Guards (Emonfu), becoming still later the Headquarters of the Outer Palace Guards (Emonfu). [衛府、大内裏、衛門府]
